name: collections::btree::navigate::<impl collections::btree::node::NodeRef<collections::btree::node::marker::ValMut<'a>, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::LeafOrInternal>>::full_range
doc:
Splits a unique reference into a pair of leaf edges delimiting the full range of the tree.
 The results are non-unique references allowing mutation (of values only), so must be used
 with care.
